welcome_message_body: Welcome to Pasuruan, a charming city known for its rich history, beautiful landscapes, and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Pasuruan has to offer during your stay. Selamat datang!

restaurants.name: Depot Rawon Sederhana Hj. Rukiyah

restaurants.address: Jl. WR. Supratman, Pasuruan, Jawa Timur 67112
